sum connect to the blockchain node through an rpc driver
desc 2 credits per rpc method in an api call
connect directly to the blockchain node provided by tatum
the get method is used the api endpoint url acts as an httpbased rpc driver
this api is supported for the following blockchains

  algorand
  bnb beacon chain
  elrond
  flow
  lisk
  stellar
  tezos
  tron
responses
200
type obj
